duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet patients professionally in person and on the phone, while answering patient questions and referring them to the appropriate contact.
Optimize provider schedules and patient access by efficient scheduling and promoting a positive patient experience.
Retrieve and update patient records to ensure availability of treatment information and verify insurance information for billing.
Perform front-end administrative tasks including registration, forms collection, and co-payment collection.
Monitor patient appointment reports, insurance eligibility, and Department Appointment Report for checkmate “kick-outs”.
Gather patient demographic data, obtain insurance information, and advise patients on financial documentation for visits.
Promote the utilization of Check Mate kiosks, scan necessary documents into Epic, and monitor waiting areas to identify and communicate wait times.
Performs check-out functions, schedules routine appointments and follow-ups, and promotes the use and sign-up of MyChart.
Maintain office inventory and equipment, ensure scanned documents are uploaded correctly in Epic, and complete administrative in-basket messages in a timely manner.
Remain current on best practices, clinic protocols, FOCUS trainings, maintain cleanliness of patient space, and maintain professional relationships with staff.
Communicate effectively with all levels of the organization, prioritize assignments, and provide appropriate materials for patient and provider needs.
